kpis.title: CPU Utilization %
kpis.base_search:
| mstats avg(cpu.idle) AS avgcpuidle max(df.used) AS maxdiskused max(memory.used) AS maxmemused avg(disk.ops.read) AS avgdiskread avg(disk.ops.write) AS avgdiskwrite avg(interface.octets.rx) AS avgnetworkbytesin avg(interface.octets.tx) AS avgnetworkbytesout where index=itsi_im_metrics by host 
| eval avgcpu=100-avgcpuidle

kpis.title: Disk I/O - Read Ops
kpis.base_search:
| mstats avg(cpu.idle) AS avgcpuidle max(df.used) AS maxdiskused max(memory.used) AS maxmemused avg(disk.ops.read) AS avgdiskread avg(disk.ops.write) AS avgdiskwrite avg(interface.octets.rx) AS avgnetworkbytesin avg(interface.octets.tx) AS avgnetworkbytesout where index=itsi_im_metrics by host 
| eval avgcpu=100-avgcpuidle
